text: Magdalene Mary "Magda" Szubanski (born 12 April 1961) is an English-born Australian actress, comedian, television presenter, radio host, author and LGBT rights advocate. She is best known for playing Sharon Strzelecki in the television comedy show Kath & Kim. She also portrayed Esme Hoggett in the movie Babe (1995) and its sequel Babe: Pig in the City (1998). Szubanski was born in Liverpool, Lancashire. She is of Polish, Irish and Scottish ancestry. She moved to Melbourne, Victoria with her family in 1965. She came out as lesbian in 2012. In May 2025, Szubanski was diagnosed with stage-4 lymphoma. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Liverpool Category:Actors from Melbourne Category:Australian comedians Category:Australian LGBT people Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian radio personalities Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian television presenters Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT comedians Category:Writers from Victoria (Australia)
title: Magda Szubanski
